comment: Good professor but absolutely get ready to read and do a lot of little assignments. The first three exams were really hard (65% was the average) but we got saved by the curve, and the final was super easy as long as you studied from/memorized the first three exams. Do the study guides, put in your time, come to class, and you'll be just fine.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: This was my second time taking Professor Solomon. She had a pretty clear and straightforward grading policy. With most classes, I get bored after like 10-15 mins into the lecture but professor Solomon gives amazing lectures and knows how to keep the class engaged. For this course, there are only 2 exams (a midterm and a final.)
Dr. Solomon is an absolute angel and I am disappointed the class is ending. She makes class enjoyable and interesting. Seriously- if you have the chance to take one of her classes do it!

Very entertaining professor who is knowledgeable about the content. Lectures were heavy but she makes it easy to understand. Took her for intro and didn't waste the chance to take her again! Love her!

Solomon is great but her teaching style did not really suit my learning style. She enjoys what she teaches and her lectures are entertaining but she doesn't necessarily lecture on what you are reading in the textbook. She'll link current events to the stuff you are reading and then lecture really fast through her powerpoints. HW is on achieve.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment:
Professor Solomon is a great professor!
She really cares about her students and opens up discussions during class to make everyone feel involved. Group work occurs in class but it's more so to give people a chance to talk with others if they don't feel comfortable in a larger group. Overall one of my favorite psych profs and she made class so easy

She is a fantastic teacher; you have weekly assignments, but it won't take more than an hour. You'll only have a mid-term and final exam, which she gives good study guides for. it seems like a lot of information but the ppts help a lot. She's very caring and accessible outside of class. Just a generally great person. TAKE HER!!!!

This teacher takes stress off your shoulders. She is understanding with all her students and engages with us. Classwork consists of quizzes which are our homework that is easy to do, you get many tries to receive a 100. No exams throughout course besides mid term and final exam.

Professor Solomon is a really caring professor. We have a very big class but she tries to get to know the students and encourages students to work together. The class was a little too easy for me. I didn't feel like I had to earn my grade, but if you need a more relaxed class, I would definitely take her.

Professor Soloman is a very kind teacher and her work is pretty easy to complete. It may be like 4 assignments due that week, but it can be done within 30min- 1 hour. 
She answers emails and she has really good study guides for exams. I would highly recommend her to anyone
Dr.Solomon is a great professor and I really recommend taking her class!! She is very nice and cares about her students. She is open to questions and the work is really easy. Would 100% recommend.
Her lectures were intriguing and made me feel involved in the discussion. You will be talking to your group quite a lot.

Professor Solomon is a great professor. Her class was well organized and pretty fun. There are assignments and quizzes for each chapter, but only 2 exams. She wants you to succeed and provides you the materials to do so.
You have assignments every week but very simple. You only have a midterm and a final. She is very outgoing and makes lectures interesting.
Just be aware there are a lot of material in each chapter which can be little over whelming at times.
She was such an engaged professor. She really wanted to get to know her students and have class engagement. She was really lenient with grading and only had a few major assignments.

She is a great teacher, really nice and does a great job working with students
However her lectures aren't the most useful but they are enjoyable and reading through the textbook and online assignments will easily prepare you for the exams.
Very nice teacher who cares about her students. Reminds me of my mom she gives mama vibes.

Took a half online, half in-person course & it was super easy. All assignments, HW,& exams are online. We met in-person once a week to review what we learned for that week. Professor Solomon is a proud latina, honestly shows a lot of compassion for what she does & really tries to connect w/ her students during class. Would definitely take her again
She is a great professor. I've taken her for intro to gen psych and human development. You can tell that she loves her job and because of that the class is 100 times easier.

Dr.Solomon is a great instructor who is always there for her students. She replies to emails quickly and clearly answers your questions, expressing any misunderstanding. In class, she helps students understand through activities rather than reading off the lecture slides. Lastly, her grading scale and criteria are fair which benefits the students.

She doesn't teach the information on the tests. Some of the questions are random details from scenarios in the textbook. Her study guides don't help because there are concepts that are on the test but not on the study guide or they are on the study guide but not on the test. Must read and take notes from the textbook to get a good grade on tests.

She is very nice but I learn nothing in her class. She jumps around in lectures and doesn't really teach anything. For tests, she gives a study guide but she doesn't teach the concepts in class so you have to figure it out yourself. The EC opportunities are normally done through group activities. She drops 7 assignments and the final is cumulative

Extra credit is entirely dependent on a group Kahoot where one member answers. Even if you're right, they could be wrong and lose you the extra credit. Won't allow for makeup exam if something happens entirely out of your control (power outage). Doesn't teach just reads off powerpoints and does icebreaker activities. Not sure what I'm paying for
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Very great professor! Everything was easy for the most part. Test were kind of difficult but manageable. I failed three test and still got an A.

I was a little worried about it but Professor Solomon made this course very interesting and manageable. There are only 6 exams including the final exam and she drops the lowest of the 6. There are practice quizzes to help prepare for the tests and sometimes she provides a study guide. This class is an easy A, as long as you put in the effort.

Mainly lectures, but she gets really into the topic and finds lots of ways to make it interesting and straight forward. Was never confused in this class. Test every other week with weekly quizzes. Lots of reading, but the textbook wasnt boring tbh. 10/10 recommend
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria

comment: This Professor is really chill and easy to talk to. She had great lectures and interesting material.
Quizzes and small assignments each week. 5/6 exams. She drops a couple of quizzes and assignments. Great lectures and very interesting stuff. Definitely learned a lot!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: This class is a real easy A, you have to try to fail it. Professor Solomon is very sweet and really chill. Her lectures were always interesting, and she really does care for her students. A test every other week that were quite simple. Some test she would send out study guides. Along with quizzes and assignments weekly. 10/10, def recommend
Amazing professor was so kind and always ready to answer questions! Made class fun and class was easy, if you pay attention!

Mrs. Solomon is an incredible professor. Throughout her PPT she cracks jokes and does small activities with the class. Her assignments and exams are easy and the lowest ones get dropped. 10/10 would recommend for everyone to take her class.

I loved Mrs. Solomon! She is so sweet and cares about her students. She puts a lot of grace in her syllabus (drops 7 assignments, 2 quizzes, and lowest test grade). 3-4 assignments and 1 quiz every week but you get 5 attempts on the quizzes. Test every other week, but read the chapter in the textbook and go over the powerpoints you will be good

She is a nice professor and course isn't too difficult. We met once a week. Attendance is taken but not required. Every assignment is easy + online (1 practice quiz with 5 attempts and 2-3 lesson review assignments). Exam every other week on 2 chapters and are somewhat difficult. Sometimes there's a study guide which is VERY helpful. I recommend.

I loved Susana Soloman. If you are going to take psych, take her! She takes attendance however it is not mandatory. My class was half online and half in person and the online lessons were extremely helpful. She is very understanding and gives amazing in person lectures as well.

AMAZING professor really sweet, and there are sometimes where she does activities in class that you have to be there for, but she lists those days out in the syllabus. Very understanding and helps as much as she can as long as you ask.

This class was for PSYC 2103 - Human Development, on the Kennesaw Campus
Works well with students

She's such a nice person and really does care about people passing. She drops 7 assignments and I believe 2 quizzes the entire semester. She also offers extra credit that you will be able to get if you attend class. The tests are kind of hard but if you do all your work, you should be fine. I would highly recommend her!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment:
She reminds us constantly to do the things we need to do. For the first exam she offered extra credit essentially for attending class. She really wants us to pass (Like dropping lowest grades on quizzes and such).

The exams can be tough, but if you use the resources available to you, show up, and do the work you will pass the class.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Great Professor definitely recommend!!
My class curriculum came solely from the textbook. All readings, assignments, quizzes, tests, and even class lectures came straight from the textbook.

VERY nice. she is a great teacher and keeps up extremely well with D2L. 3 weekly assignments that are easy and informative. 3 tests that are on the information from the weekly assignments and some discussion posts that are not hard.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Easy class, 3 easy assignments on the weekly, but like extremely easy. There are only three tests. This class is super easy take her for an easy A.
